data.title: The Delinquent Shimizu-san Sitting Next to Me Has Dyed Her Hair Black
data.title_english: The Delinquent Shimizu-san Sitting Next to Me Has Dyed Her Hair Black
data.synopsis:
「Shimizu-san, you dyed your hair black.」

「Ah, yes.」

「Why did you dye it all of a sudden?」

「Because…yesterday…」

Shimizu-san, who sat next to me and had dyed her hair from blonde to black gradually lowered her voice, slightly blushed, and laid her face down on the desk.

data.title: Danjo no Yuujou wa Seiritsu suru? (Iya, Shinai!!)
data.title_english: Can friendship between men and women be established? (No, it can't!!)
data.synopsis:
At a certain countryside middle school, a boy and a girl swore eternal friendship to each other.

Heading towards that shared dream——the bond between these two remains unchanged over the span of two years.

Himari Inuzuka, a cheerful girl who has yet to find her first love, and Yuu Natsume, a botanical enthusiast who loves flowers, still spend their days peacefully as best friends in the gardening club in the second year of high school.

「If Yuu can’t get married, I have to take responsibility.」

「I’m having trouble now because after Himari said that, your brother began calling me ‘My brother-in-law!’」

However, when Yuu reunites with his first crush, the gears of their relationship suddenly go out of sync!

Will Himari, now having known love, be able to break free from being just the ‘ideal friend’?
